column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: It is prohibited to be in a public place or in a closed place, not being onehouse or an associated yard, in a company of more than 50 people to keep or allow persons to be in a company of more than50 people Comment: Ban of gatherings > 50 there are some exeptions for religious events, demonstrations etc but it seems to apply to most public outdoor gatherings
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.
column21: Quote: It is prohibited to be in a public place or in a closed place, not being onehouse or an associated yard, in a company of more than 50 people to keep or allow persons to be in a company of more than50 people Comment: Ban of gatherings > 50 there are some exeptions for religious events, demonstrations etc but it seems to apply to most public indoor gatherings

column52: Most or all gastronomy is closed or limited to take-away
column54:
Quote: All cafes and restaurants are closed. Comment: remain closed on 17th of Novemeber, 15th December and 12th of Jan
Takeaways may open.
The rules do not apply to cafes and restaurants at:
hotels (for hotel guests);
funeral homes;
airports past the security check.
Caf√©s and restaurants in other buildings must be closed.
For example in museums. Comment: The rules apply from Wednesday, October 14 at 10 p.m. so applied on 15/10/2020

column60: A large fraction of leisure time venues are closed
column62:
Quote: Most places and buildings where many people come together are closed. 
This applies to indoors and outdoors.
These are for example:

Cinemas and theaters
Zoos and amusement parks
Swimming pools    Comment: on previous announcment October 14th: the following events may take place: (Food markets, Trade fairs and conferences, Cinemas and theaters, Matches, Demonstrations). Therefore I think most leisure time venues were shut on the next announcment November 4th
Came into force: 5/11/2020 as it was inforce from 10pm on the 4/11/2020: http://web.archive.org/web/20201107144025/https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/binaries/rijksoverheid/documenten/publicaties/2020/11/03/coronavirus-factsheet-tijdelijke-verzwaring-van-de-gedeeltelijke-lockdown-vertalingen/201103_Maatr_3Nov_EN_02.pdf
column68: Most or all retail shops are closed
column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments
Cinemas
Zoos
amusement parks

Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.

Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.

Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.

Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: The government has already introduced measures in parts of our country to prevent further spread of the corona virus. Such as the early closing time of catering establishments. But also the ban on parties of more than 50 people inside and outside

column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

Which of the service types were closed?

Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand

Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link

Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners

Theaters and cinemas are closed

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:

Which of the service types were closed?

Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand

Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.

Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners

Libraries remain open to collect books.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.

Government organizations remain open.

locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners

column18:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: There will be a ban on staying with more than 50 people. This applies, for example, to parties, drinks and outings for groups of this size. This applies both indoors and outdoors. There are a number of exceptions to this rule, such as demonstrations, religious gatherings, funerals, and dance and theater practices.
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

column68: Most or all retail shops are closed
column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.

Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments
Cinemas
Zoos
amusement parks
Casinos
 swimming pools

Most shops are closed.

Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.

locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. column18:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 40 people come together in one place in the open air.
Children count. People don't walk around in that place. Comment: maximum of 40 people, comes in at 6pm on the 29th so functionally from the 30th
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums

sex establishments

amusement parks

Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.

column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores

sex establishments

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: There will be a ban on staying with more than 50 people. This applies, for example, to parties, drinks and outings for groups of this size. This applies both indoors and outdoors. Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand

Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link

Hotels are open to stay overnight.

Government organizations remain open.

locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed

All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.

A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.

Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed

When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed

All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: You are not allowed to stay in groups of more than 50 people. This applies, for example, to parties, drinks and outings for groups of this size. This applies both indoors and outdoors.
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.
column21: Quote: You are not allowed to stay in groups of more than 50 people. This applies, for example, to parties, drinks and outings for groups of this size. This applies both indoors and outdoors. This measure has been introduced because if you 'belong together' it is more difficult to keep your distance from the people you are with than from others. A larger number of contact moments arise more quickly in groups than between people who do not belong to the same company.

Which of the service types were closed?

Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand

Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link

Hotels are open to stay overnight.

Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners

column21:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 40 people come together in one place in the open air.
Children count. People don't walk around in that place. Comment: maximum of 40 people, comes in at 6pm on the 29th so functionally from the 30th
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.
column21:

Theaters and cinemas are closed.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums

sex establishments

amusement parks

Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: There will be a  ban  on staying in companies of more than 50 people. This applies to parties, drinks and outings for groups of this size, for example. This applies both indoors and outdoors. There are a number of exceptions to this rule, such as demonstrations, religious gatherings, funerals, and dance and theater practices. Comment: starts functionally on 21st of september
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

funeral homes;
airports past the security check.
Caf√©s and restaurants in other buildings must be closed.

These are for example:

Cinemas and theaters
Zoos and amusement parks
Swimming pools    Comment: on previous announcment October 14th: the following events may take place: (Food markets, Trade fairs and conferences, Cinemas and theaters, Matches, Demonstrations). Therefore I think most leisure time venues were shut on the next announcment November 4th

column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.

Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments
Cinemas
Zoos
amusement parks
Casinos
 swimming pools

column21:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:

column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores

sex establishments

column11:
Quote: A maximum of 4 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.Comment: appears to apply from 19th of Novemeber
column18: Quote: A maximum of 30 people may be together in an indoor space. Children count Comment: National guidance applied from the 19th of September
column21:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 40 people come together in one place in the open air.
Children count. People don't walk around in that place. Comment: maximum of 40 people, comes in at 6pm on the 29th so functionally from the 30th
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.
column21:
Quote: A maximum of 30 people may be together in an indoor space.
Children count.

funeral homes;
airports past the security check.

Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.

Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments

amusement parks

Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 40 people come together in one place in the open air.
Children count. People don't walk around in that place. Comment: maximum of 40 people, comes in at 6pm on the 29th so functionally from the 30th
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores

sex establishments

amusement parks

column8: Quote: The group outside may not exceed 2 people Comment: Came into force: 5/11/2020 as it was inforce from 10pm on the 4/11/2020: http://web.archive.org/web/20201107144025/https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/binaries/rijksoverheid/documenten/publicaties/2020/11/03/coronavirus-factsheet-tijdelijke-verzwaring-van-de-gedeeltelijke-lockdown-vertalingen/201103_Maatr_3Nov_EN_02.pdf
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 4 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.Comment: appears to apply from 19th of Novemeber
column18: Quote: A maximum of 30 people may be together in an indoor space. Children count Comment: National guidance applied from the 19th of September
column21:
Quote: Stay at home as much as possible. Also during the holidays.
Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11:
Quote: A maximum of 40 people come together in one place in the open air.
Children count. People don't walk around in that place. Comment: maximum of 40 people, comes in at 6pm on the 29th so functionally from the 30th
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.
column21:
Quote: A maximum of 30 people may be together in an indoor space.
Children count.

hotels (for hotel guests);
funeral homes;
airports past the security check.
Caf√©s and restaurants in other buildings must be closed.
For example in museums. Comment: The rules apply from Wednesday, October 14 at 10 p.m. so applied on 15/10/2020

Zoos and amusement parks

column68: Most or all retail shops are closed
column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.

Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments
Cinemas
Zoos
amusement parks
Casinos
 swimming pools

Work at home. Only go to work when you have to.
People who work in healthcare are allowed to continue working.
A maximum of 2 people may be together outside.
Or all people who belong to 1 household.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Receive up to 2 people at home.
Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
On 24, 25 and 26 December you may receive a maximum of 3 people at home. Children up to and including 12 years are not included.
Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.
Rules for sports
Outdoor sports are allowed with a maximum of 2 people (excluding trainer). Comment: Stay at home order inforced, as most venues for public indoor gatherings are shut, seems most public indoor gatherings were banned.

column6: No limit on most public gatherings
column8:
Quote: "250 people are allowed to gather in outdoor areas.
Staff does not count.
More than 250 people are allowed in places with fixed seats.
You reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.
This applies, for example, in the catering industry.
There is no maximum number of people at zoos and amusement parks." Comment: As gatherings with fixed seats were allowed above 250 and this did not apply to zoos or amusement parks it is not possible to say that most public outdoor gatherings were limited in this period. This is inline with the interpretation of this NPI in other countries.
column11: Quote: It is forbidden to be in a public space or in a closed place, other than a homeor an associated yard, in a company of more than 50 people to keep orto allow people to be in a company of more than 50 people
column16: No ban on public indoor gatherings
column18:
Quote: A maximum of 100 people may come together in rooms inside.
Staff does not count.
More than 100 people are allowed.
But only if you reserve a spot.
And you will receive a health check.This applies, for example, to cinemas, cafes, restaurants, theaters, weddings and funerals. Comment: As it seems seated indoor events could exceed 100 with no upper limit, I have interpreted this as no limit in this period in line with other countries.

funeral homes;
airports past the security check.
Caf√©s and restaurants in other buildings must be closed.

column70:
Quote: Rules for shopping and entertainment
Theaters and cinemas are closed.
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed.
Saunas and casinos are closed.
Hotels are open to stay overnight.
The restaurants in hotels are closed.
Most shops are closed.
Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout.
Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open.
Government organizations remain open.
Libraries remain open to collect books.   Comment: Summary:
First period:
Which of the service types were closed?
Close-contact services were closed 
Non-close-contact services were open 
When were they closed?
Close-contact services closed after NPI introduced 15/12/2020 they were not in place beforehand 
Non-close-contact services: NA - they remained open 


Only 1 period during a ‚Äúlockdown‚Äù, started on 15/12/2020 and did not end. Full list of things shut Link 
Things open after 15th December lockdown:
Hotels are open to stay overnight. 
 Supermarkets are open. The bakery, butcher and other shops for food and drink are also open.
Drugstores, pharmacies, opticians, hearing care professionals and shops for repair and maintenance may also remain open.
Hardware stores are open for takeout. Places where you can pick up and send parcels may remain open.
Banks remain open
Government organizations remain open. 
Libraries remain open to collect books.
locations for business and financial services - This includes, for example, the following activities: legal services and administration, banks, mortgage lenders, civil-law notaries, brokers, rental of movable property, employment agencies and employment agencies, translation agencies, copy shops, etc. Banking services in, for example, bookstores can also continue. The rest of the store is closed, no sales allowed.
laundries and dry cleaners
Things closed after 15th December lockdown: 
Theaters and cinemas are closed
Hairdressers, beauticians, nail salons and sex establishments are closed.
Tattoo shops and nail salons are closed
Saunas and casinos are closed. 
The restaurants in hotels are closed
Things that were already closed before 15th December: link 
All food and beverage outlets close their doors. Pick up is still possible. The exceptions are: Hotels for hotel guests who stay overnight. Funeral homes. Airports past the security check. Company canteens. Food and beverage outlets in healthcare facilities for patients and visitors of patients. Food and beverage outlets at locations for organized daytime activities for vulnerable groups. Locations with a combined function close the part with a catering function.
8pm curfew for retail stores
Museums
Theaters
sex establishments
Cinemas
Zoos
amusement parks
Casinos
 swimming pools

stores

stations
airports
parking garages
gas stations
restaurants and cafes
theaters and concert halls.
